title: As a BOC Admin, I want the Auto-Recall Batch to Omit Certain Players
custom_preconds:
h1. INC0198038

GIVEN a user is signed in as a BOC ADMIN
custom_steps: WHEN running the Auto-Recall Batch
custom_expected:
THEN players on Option who belong to an Org who are in the playoffs and have not satisfied their minimum period of inactivity [10 days for position players/15 players for pitchers] should be omitted from the batch and not recalled
AND the Last Playoff Game date on the club season dates screen should drive which clubs are still playing
AND if the date is in the future, the player will not be recalled

**Example:** *Dakota Hudson, who was Optioned on 10/5/22, would not be recalled as part of the batch run on 10/6/22 because the Cardinals are in the post-season and he has not fulfilled his 15 day minimum period of inactivty*

title: As a BOC user I want the return of additional player transaction to return the player to the option status they were on upon appointment
custom_preconds: Given a user is signed in as a BOC User
custom_steps: WHEN the optioned MLS period starts
custom_expected:
THEN players who are appointed as an additional player and then returned need to be returned to the correct status
AND if they had been optioned PRIOR to the start of optioned MLS then appointed
THEN they are returned to the optioned status[ID 27] and do not receive MLS for future option days
BUT If they had been optioned AFTER the start of the optioned MLS then appointed
THEN they are returned to optioned with MLS status[ID 64] and continue to receive MLS for future option days

title: As a developer I want to use the new projected EOS MLS values to simplify the Free Agent Filings report in predicted mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is a developer
AND the Free Agent Filings Report is updated to use the projected EOS MLS rather than the projected value on its own
custom_steps: WHEN the Free Agent Filings report is run in predicted
custom_expected:
THEN the report should run correctly [with simpler and faster SQL]
AND generate accurate results using the new fields rather than projecting on its own

title: As a BOC Admin, I want players with a submitted Vol. Ret. Tx to stop counting against limits
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN a player is submitted with a Voluntary Retired List Transaction
custom_expected:
THEN that player will no longer count against an Active, Reserve, or other Roster Limits
AND the player should continue appearing on rosters as expected

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see an Additional Text Field added to the Add D
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC Admin
AND an Additional Text Field has been added to the Add D
custom_steps: WHEN on the Add D
custom_expected:
THEN the Additional Text Field on the Add D should function the same way as the field on the Add C does
AND the Additional Text Field should also print when printing the Add D

title: As a BOC Admin, I want any Domestic Org Count Over the Limit to Appear in Red
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN an Org has a Domestic Reserve List Total that is over the Domestic Reserve List Limit
custom_expected:
THEN the Domestic Org Count should appear in red
AND this red font should be consistent with the other formatting used to indicate the violation of a roster limit
AND the Limit and Totals should appear on both the MJ Summary dashboard and the MJ/MN Rosters dashboard

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Appointment of 27th Man tx renamed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC Admin
AND the Appointment of 27th Man transaction has been be renamed to: "The Appointment of Additional Player"
AND the TX Code has also changed from APPT27 to APPTAP
custom_steps: WHEN this transaction is updated
custom_expected:
THEN all lookups and references should be updated as well
AND should confirm the impact of LINK downstream

title: As an Intl Admin, I want the layout of Intl Amateur Profiles Updated
custom_preconds:
**Business Value:** With the launch of IPL, Intl Ama contact information will no longer be Org dependent.  One set of contact information will come from IPL.  If an Org has the ability to view the player, they will see that player's contact information.

Wire: [https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=master&g=1|https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=master&g=1]

GIVEN user is an Intl Admin
custom_steps: WHEN viewing an Intl Ama Player Profile
custom_expected:
THEN the layout of the International Amateur profiles will be updated to align with the provided wire
AND there will no longer be an Org dropdown
AND already entered profiles will also be updated [already existing profiles will use Master or BOC contact info as the contact info of record]
AND trainer/agent/league information will be broken out into their own section [this section will have two subsections: trainers and agents]
AND the section will match the layout in the provided layout
AND no Clubs will be able to edit contact information on an Intl Ama profile in EBIS

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Add D salary to be easy to update
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC Admin
AND Add D Salary is converted to an ebis_constant
custom_steps: WHEN Add D salary needs to be updated
custom_expected: THEN Add D Salary should be able to be updated without a build

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the Addendum D Salary Updated
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is a BOC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN the Add D Salary constant is updated to $750
custom_expected: THEN the new salary should appear correctly on the printed addendum

title: As a League Economis user I want to add contract Ids of the players active contract to the transaction.
custom_preconds:
Given the user is a League Economics User
AND the active_mjc_id and active_mnc_id fields have been added to the tx_player_details table
custom_steps: WHEN there is a state change of a transaction or transaction is saved
custom_expected:
THEN the fields will be populated with the corresponding contract ID
AND if the transaction happens to terminate the contract
THEN the field will remain populated
BUT if there is a pre-existing transaction
THEN it will have no data
AND data will only be populated on newly approved transactions

title: As a League Economics user I want the increase years on major contract salary escalators to be sorted in ascending year order
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is a League Economics User
AND a player has salary escalator years in his contract
custom_steps: WHEN editing or saving a contract
custom_expected:
THEN salary escalator increase years will be sorted in ascending year order on the contract's contract tab in the salary escalator section
AND the salary escalator increase years will be sorted in ascending year order on the contract's summary tab when the escalator is expanded

title: As a League Economics user I want the report prompts to stay open after running one of the payroll reports
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a League Economics user
custom_steps:
WHEN running the following reports: 
Competitive Balance Tax Assessment,
Payroll Comparison,
Payrolls - Player Details,
Payrolls - Team Details,
Total Payroll Comp - Player Details,
Total Payroll Comp - Team Details,
Multi-Year Report - Player Details,
Multi-Year Report - Team Details,
custom_expected:
THEN the above report parameter modals will remain open after clicking 'OK' or 'Run to Excel' 
AND all other reports with parameter modals close immediately upon running
AND reports without parameter modals work correctly
AND clicking cancel, the close icon in the top right, or click anywhere else on the page will close the report prompts

title: Tech Debt - Store actual draft pick rather than calculating it in SQL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN actual_overall_pick exists in the RULE4_SELECTION table
AND overall_pick_display is being populated based on the value that comes out of RULE4_DRAFT_SELECTIONS_VIEW
AND the existing draft views (including RULE4_DRAFT_SELECTIONS_VIEW) are updated to use this field
custom_steps: WHEN selecting a rule 4 draft pick
custom_expected: THEN the draft pick should be stored in this EBIS field and results should be faster than calculating with SQL

title: As a BOC User, I want to send a player memo via Text
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC User
custom_steps: WHEN a player memo is sent
custom_expected:
THEN EBIS should send the memo to all players via Text using the MLB Official Contact Info
AND deliveries and failures should be logged and available for download

title: As a BOC User, I want to send a player memo via WhatsApp
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC User
custom_steps: WHEN a player memo is sent
custom_expected:
THEN EBIS should send the memo to all players via WhatsApp using the MLB Official Contact Info
AND deliveries and failures should be logged and available for download

title: As an Intl Admin, I want Origins to reflect IPL Invitations
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is an Intl Admin
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the Reg Admin Widget
custom_expected:
THEN the Org under 'Registered By' and 'Also Registered By' will reflect the Orgs who sent the invitations to the players
AND The first org to invite a player will appear under 'Registered By'
THEN any Org issuing subsequent invitations will appear under 'Also Registered By'
AND if the BOC invites a player 
THEN BOC will appear as the Origin
AND Players who register through the Self Registration process will also appear as BOC origin

title: As an Intl Admin, I want Registered By and Last Updated usernames accurately displayed in ebis
custom_preconds:
Related to [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISII-20367|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISII-20367]

GIVEN a user is an Intl Admin
custom_steps: WHEN a player is registered or updated in IPL as a BOC User
custom_expected:
THEN their full username will continue to be displayed, regardless of what system the update is made
BUT IF the player registers or makes updates to their profile in IPL
THEN EBIS will display 'Player' and the username
AND 'Last Updated' should only reflect updates to reviews, general profile updates are not reflected

title: Retest EBIS to IPL Integration
Clean up vault properties
custom_preconds:
Only secret properties should be in vault. We should use something like spring cloud config with github for non-secret shared properties so they can be under version control.



h3. Regression Testing Required

* Link
** lookup changes are reflected in link api
** player or tx (only need to test one) changes are reflected in link api
** Systems > Ebis Link page shows correct number of pending records
** Destager works
* esign
** normal workflow works
* IPL
** Data is synced properly between Ebis and IPL
* Reporting
** Smoke test
* Draft
** Running the draft works and picks are reflected
* Email
** sending an email works
* File
** Upload/download file works
* Highmark
** highmark batch sends file to highmark
* Fama
** fama batch sends data to fama
* DTS
** DTS data is synced to ebis
* Lari Integration
** Data is synced properly between Ebis and Lari
* AMT
** Front page loads and updates work
* Partner
** Front page loads and updates work

title: As a developer, I want to make make the AMT approaching threshold a configurable ebis_constant
custom_preconds:
Reference:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789751/Prospect+Statuses

GIVEN user is a developer
custom_steps: WHEN AMT Approaching threshold is updated to be a configurable ebis_constant
custom_expected:
THEN each period will have its own ebis_constant
AND daysLimitFromSystemValues - threshold will be calculated for each period
AND Players who are 0-6 Months From Signing will no longer be allotted 15 days in a 45 day period, they will now be allotted 45 days in a 90 day period [PIVOTAL-711]

title: Including IL players o the Average Salary LRD report
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC Admin
custom_steps:
WHEN players are placed on the IL
AND the Average Salary LRD Report is ran
custom_expected: THEN the players on the IL are included in the 26 Man Roster on the Average Salary LRD Report

title: As an Intl Admin, I want updates made to accommdate new Trainers coming from IPL
custom_steps:
Remove the Create New button on the Trainers/Agents widget

Also disable delete functionality from Trainer profiles

Remove Add New Trainer Links from workflows (i.e. registering new player)

Update dropdowns and widgets to only display Trainers with an ID >= 10000000

title: Add Audit Log to Trainer/Agent Merges
custom_steps:
Concerns exist about LARI not receiving information about Trainer merges.  In order to provide them with that info, we need to track it/

AC:

Create new table to track merges of international trainers

INT_TRAINER_MERGE_HISTORY or something similar

When merges occur, the MasterID and other ID will be written out to the table
